ygData.subject: RE: Char Catillion
ygData.msgSnippet: No. It does not require an instrument. Are you sure you are close enough to the person you are trying to affect? Are you sure you are waiting long enough for
ygData.messageBody:
No. It does not require an instrument. Are you sure you are close enough to
the person you are trying to affect?
Are you sure you are waiting long enough for it to take effect. If you
haven';t seen the message, something is wrong.
You can't do this over the counter in Freeport. You have to go to the other
side to do it.

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Papa Legba [mailto:legba@...]
>Sent: Friday, January 07, 2000 10:35 AM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Char Catillion
>
>
>This is what I do, and I;ve never gotten an improvment in /con or an
>improvemnt in prices. I hav enever seen the xxxx look sfriendly message
>either.
>
>Does this song require an insturment (I cant remember which one, but I
>am not high enough level yet to have it)
>
>
>
>"Joshua R. Moore" wrote:
>>
>> I never got "Name looks friendly"
>>
>> I get "You feel an aura of enchantment wash over you" and the NPC glows.
>>
>> Then, you /con the NPC, and he should view you better.
>>
>--
>We now return to the non-stop rock.
>
>Matt DeBarger
